original_text:
it entwines its roots around a pile of rocks
    and looks for a place among the stones.
korean_text: 그 뿌리가 돌무더기에 서리어서 돌 가운데로 들어갔을지라도

sentences.original_text: it entwines its roots around a pile of rocks
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그 뿌리를 바위 더미 주위에 감습니다

sentences.original_text: and looks for a place among the stones
